name: 謝佳玲
objective: 本課程著重於: (1)藉由科技性文章的閱讀來幫助非理工背景之學生了解一般科技性文章之語法、文體與結構組織，(2)幫助學生熟悉技術報告以及科技論文之撰寫。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Unit 1 Research
3. Unit 1 Research
4. Unit 2 Introduction
5. Key words 1
6. Unit 3 Introduction
7. Unit 4 Introduction
8. Key words 2
9. Midterm exam
10. Unit 5 Method
11. Unit 6 Material
12. Key words 3
13. Unit 7 Results
14. Unit 8 Discussion
15. Unit 9 Abstract
16. Key words 4
17. Final exam
18. Discussion
scorePolicy:
1. Class attendance, lesson preparation, class participation: 10-20%
2. Oral presentations, PowerPoint slides: 20-40%
3. Quizzes, exams: 50-70%
materials:
1. Weissberg, R. and S. Buker. 2005. Writing Up Research: Experimental Research Report Writing for Students of English. Taipei: Pearson Education Taiwan Ltd.
2. Mascull, Bill. 2004. Collins Cobuild Key Words in Science and Technology: Helping Learners with Real English. London: Harper Collins Publishers.
